import React, { useState } from 'react' import 'firebase/auth' import { useFirebaseApp } from 'reactfire' import './Forms.css' function Forms() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const submit = async() => { const firebase = useFirebase().createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email, password) } return(
{setEmail(e.target.value)}}>
{setPassword(e.target.value)}}>
) } export default Forms
